name: Lorie Santos
text: Happy birthday, Roy! Glad to have been able to share words with you more recently on FB and real life -- since we never got to talk in high school.

source_obj.text: Happy birthday, Roy! Glad to have been able to share words with you more recently on FB and real life -- since we never got to talk in high school.

replies.text: Thanks Lorie~ Hit me up for words anytime lol
